tasks.label: node ad-hoc KWNR query
args: (async()=>{const pool=require('./backend/db/pool');const c=await pool.connect();try{const q=`SELECT t.id,t.type,t.amount,t.description,t.extra_description,t.date,a.name acc,c2.name cat FROM transactions t LEFT JOIN accounts a ON a.id=t.account_id LEFT JOIN categories c2 ON c2.id=t.category_id WHERE t.description ILIKE '%KWNR%' OR t.extra_description ILIKE '%KWNR%' OR c2.name ILIKE '%KWNR%' ORDER BY t.date DESC, t.id DESC LIMIT 20`;const r=await c.query(q);console.log(r.rows);}catch(e){console.error(e);}finally{c.release();}})()
